intro: Brachyscome gracilis, commonly known as the slender everlasting flower, is a low-growing, mat-forming plant native to Australia. It features small, daisy-like flowers that range in color from white to pink, blooming throughout the year in suitable conditions. The plant has narrow, grass-like leaves and is well adapted to dry, sandy soils. It is often used in gardens for its ornamental value and ability to thrive in coastal areas. Brachyscome gracilis is also valued for its role in stabilizing soil and supporting local wildlife.
